about_the_game:
Year 2 Pass!

This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's second year! We will be releasing a new DLC every 2 months, each containing a new world to complete. 6 new worlds to explore! Over 700 levels to complete!

Contents

Although each DLC will be available for purchase individually, this year 2 pass will shave 16% off the total price.
Here is a breakdown of the DLCs included, as well as when we intend to introduce some new mechanics to the game:
  • 1 - Incipiam (Mar 2022)
  • 2 - Insulam (May 2022) + new Zone Tile mechanic
  • 3 - Cogitare (Jul 2022)
  • 4 - Novus (Sep 2022) + new Portal Wall mechanic
  • 5 - Paenultima (Nov 2022)
  • 6 - Finis (Dec 2022)
detailed_description:
Year 2 Pass!

This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's second year! We will be releasing a new DLC every 2 months, each containing a new world to complete. 6 new worlds to explore! Over 700 levels to complete!

Contents

Although each DLC will be available for purchase individually, this year 2 pass will shave 16% off the total price.
Here is a breakdown of the DLCs included, as well as when we intend to introduce some new mechanics to the game:
  • 1 - Incipiam (Mar 2022)
  • 2 - Insulam (May 2022) + new Zone Tile mechanic
  • 3 - Cogitare (Jul 2022)
  • 4 - Novus (Sep 2022) + new Portal Wall mechanic
  • 5 - Paenultima (Nov 2022)
  • 6 - Finis (Dec 2022)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: hexceed - Year 2 Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This is your pass to 6 exciting new worlds to complete in hexceed! With 700+ levels to complete, and 2 more puzzle mechanics to discover!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
